headline: 1 Healthcare Stock to Target This Week and 2 to Turn Down
summary: Personal health and wellness is one of the many secular tailwinds for healthcare companies. Despite the rosy long-term prospects, short-term headwinds such as COVID inventory destocking have harmed the industry’s returns - over the past six months, healthcare stocks have collectively shed 11.1%. This drop was worse than the S&P 500’s 4% decline.
